CustomField.defaultValue: "Include the 5 reasons (why's) for the Incident - http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/5_Whys"
CustomField.inlineHelpText: “The 5 Whys is a question-asking method used to explore the cause/effect relationships underlying a particular problem. Ultimately, the goal of applying the 5 Whys method is to determine a root cause of a defect or problem.”
CustomField.label: Why did this occur?
